title: Rock Golem Debt Collectors
mainText: {kw:Effect} — When you draw any Rocks ({r:rocks=x}) treasure card, choose one:{n}- trash it and add one counter to this event;{n}- discard it.{n}{n}{kw:Resolve}{r:vp=1} — trash this card.
flavourText: We have suffered your pecking at our backs long enough! Now is the time to pay back the debt in blood. Golem blood! - Rock Golems
